projects.title: 1972 Yamaha CS3 Carburetor Removal Manual
projects.description: This is an instruction manual I wrote for Saints Cycle Works, a vintage motorcycle shop I worked at. The manual guides a user through basic carburetor removal in preparation for cleaning. The target audience is new bike mechanics or hobbyists.

projects.title: Getting Started with Phishing Simulation
projects.description: This is a Getting Started page I wrote (along with all of its child topics) for Trend Vision One's new Phishing Simulation feature. I regularly contribute to the Vision One Online Help for various apps and features. Our documentation toolchain consists of DITA XML, Oxygen, Git/GitHub, and an internal CMS to generate output.

projects.title: With generational change, Taiwan’s King Steel transforms into an innovation and sustainability leader
projects.description: This is a Microsoft case study on King Steel, a Taiwanese machinery manufacturing company that's helping driving sustainability in the shoe manufacturing industry with their injection molding technology. I edited this piece, and later wrote web copy for King Steel's English website.

projects.title: What You Need to Know About E-bike Battery Safety
projects.description: This is an article on e-bike battery safety I wrote for Tern, a bike manufacturing company. I've written multiple articles for Tern and am proud to collaborate with an eco-conscious company truly invested in sustainable transportation.
